name: Custom In-Game Progress Bar Color
description: Lets you change your progress bar color in-game.

mode.name: Working Mode (see info)
mode.description:
What the numbers mean:

<cg>0: Vanilla Behavior</c> (uses your primary color)
<cy>1: Secondary Color</c>
<co>2: Player Glow Color</c>
<cp>3: Custom (set below!)</c>
<cl>4: Chroma</c>
<cj>5: Pastel</c>
<cr>The ability to change how fast chroma/pastel color updates will be added in the future.</c>

color.name: Custom Color
color.description: Set the <cg>custom progress bar</c> color here. <cy>Working mode</c> must be set to <co>3</c>.

speed.name: RGB Speed
speed.description:
Set <cg>how fast</c> the color alternates. <cy>Working mode</c> must be set to <co>4 or 5</c>.
<cr>Setting it to 0 won't crash the game.</c>

change-on-new-best.name: Change on New Best
change-on-new-best.description: Self-explanatory, enables the feature. Configure the color below.

best-color.name: Color on New Best
best-color.description: Set the <cg>color</c> of the progress bar when you achieve a <cy>new best</c>.

issues.info: Please report any problem you have to this mod's GitHub repository by making an issue!
